name: Roll for Role (RyanLyon&Lyons)
description:
A strange pop up appears on your computer and asks if you want to change your fate. With one click you’ve somehow landed an interview with the CEO of Evil Corp! They say that opportunity is 50% luck, 50% preparedness, so roll the dice and see if you can score that job! Your life depends on it…

Best of luck everyone who's participating in the jam!!

Music By 

Airport Lounge by Kevin MacLeod | http://incompetech.com

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
